overview: Indulge your most daring dreams as Playboy's Playmates lead you on an uninhibited and erotic journey. Alluring, intriguing, mischievous and stunning, nothing is off limits as they leave their inhibitions behind to share a series of unpredictable moments that will captivate your imagination and scintillate your senses. And these girls are ready and willing to please each other with forbidden pleasures. Playboy ventures deep into an exotic world to transport you to a destination where the possibilities are endless. So sinfully exciting you'll wonder if they were really fantasies at all!
title: Playboy: Playmate Erotic Adventures
